metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart at the Epilogue party. Idle AD lines reacting to Shar spitefully tormenting her with her wound curse. Shadowheart, who has turned from Shar, is quietly defiant in the face of her former goddess's prodding.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Agh... I'm going to enjoy myself, and you can't stop me. Back to the shadows with you.
0.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, but quickly brushing it off/offering a defiant retort to Shar sotto voce. 'I'm here to party and you're not stopping me'. Arc: SH turned from Shar

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Agh... have you nothing better to do, Shar? What a sad creature you are.
1.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, but quickly brushing it off/offering a defiant retort to Shar sotto voce. 'I'm here to party and you're not stopping me'. Arc: SH turned from Shar
